name: div
features: Delivery: Fast & Free Shipping on all orders
Colorway: White, Pink, or Columbia Blue
5-Star Fabric: Lightweight 4.0 oz micro poly interlock engineered for elite performance & comfort
Moisture Wicking : Designed to pull sweat away from the body to keep you dry & cool
Stain Release : Easy-care fabric resists staining & odors for long-lasting freshness
Sun Protection : Built-in 44+ UPF shields against harmful UV rays during outdoor activities
Reinforced Seams : Shoulder seams are reinforced for added strength & long-term wear
Double Needle Hem : Provides enhanced structure & a clean finish
Tag-Free Neck : Delivers itch-free comfort during intense training or all-day wear
